definitions.title: v.b. knock, strike
definitions.body: only in specif. sense of hit, strike or bring down (a bird), and only fig. (Ecclus [[ינקשׁ]] Sir 41:2 c striketh against ([[ב]]; marg. [[ונוקשׁ]]), so [[נוקשׁ ב]] Sir 13:2; NH knock, strike e.g. the knees, or a door (so Hiph.); Aram. (incl. BAram.) [[נְקַשׁ]] id., nqa4 fixit, impegit, percussit, etc. (Ar. naqa4a strike in, carve, etc., is loan-wd. Frä:194);—the Heb. vb. appar. means bring down with a [certain kind of] stick, perh. like a boomerang, v. descript. and illustr. in Wilkinson:Ægypten 323 WMM:Asien u. Europa 123 f.);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. [[נוֹקֵשׁ]] Ps 9:17 he (´[[י]]) striketh down the wicked (so Hup-Now De Che); Vrss Ol Ew Bae Kau We Buhl:Lex rd. [[נוֹקַשׁ]],

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 2 ms. [[תִּנׇּקֵשׁ אַחֲרֵיהֶם]] De 12:30 lest thou be thrust (impelled) after them.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יְנַקֵּשׁ]] Ps 109:11 let the creditor strike at, take aim at ([[ל]]); 3 mpl. [[וַיְנַקְּשׁוּ]] Ps 38:13 (abs.).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מִתְנַקֵּשׁ בְּנַפְשִׁי]] 1Sa 28:9 why art thou striking at my life?
